data.lyric:
[ti:OMDB]
[ar:Rod Wave]
[al:SoulFly (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]OMDB - Rod Wave
[00:10.11]Lyrics by：Rodarius Green/Aaron Tago/Alexander Stoddard
[00:20.22]Ayy ayy ayy ayy ayy that probably Tago
[00:23.28]How I'm feeling it doesn't matter
[00:29.16]'Cause you know I'm okay
[00:33.28]Yeah yeah
[00:34.66]Instead I ask myself "Why do you worry"
[00:39.94]Worry
[00:40.69]You know you know I'm the same
[00:45.38]You know I'm the same
[00:46.52]Still I know you don't love me baby
[00:51.64]Yeah
[00:51.91]They try to take you away from me
[00:57.95]Only over my dead body
[01:09.79]Wake up and look inside the mirror and it blows me
[01:12.09]Blows me
[01:12.72]Outta all the n***as out the trenches God chose me
[01:15.00]Chose me
[01:15.68]I got the city on my back and the city told me
[01:18.30]Yeah
[01:18.53]No matter the pressure or the stress won't bend or fold me
[01:20.80]Fold me
[01:21.46]So much that come with being famous it can drive ya crazy
[01:23.91]Crazy
[01:24.51]Go check the d**gs my brother takin' he's hallucinatin'
[01:26.82]Hallucinatin'
[01:27.04]How the hell you go and tell Nana I sold my soul to Satan
[01:29.93]That just how rare it is for n***as out my town to make it
[01:32.85]Somebody grab him and pinch him please this ain't a dream
[01:35.65]This ain't a dream
[01:36.28]Stay off the internet king this life ain't what it seems
[01:38.17]Ain't what it seems
[01:38.90]F**k all the blogs and the memes out there laughin' at me
[01:41.48]Yeah
[01:41.65]I just woke up six million-plus on my way overseas
[01:44.15]Yeah yeah
[01:44.68]I remember five hundred dollar shows I hit the roads for these
[01:47.05]Roads for these
[01:47.70]Now I get a hunnid a occasion in the quarantine
[01:49.66]Quarantine
[01:50.33]We used to be the underdog but now we standing tall
[01:52.78]Standing tall
[01:53.38]The stage collapsed the only time you'll see me fall
[01:55.53]And n***as who ahead of me
[01:56.91]Yeah
[01:57.70]Was already two years ahead of me
[01:59.99]Yeah yeah yeah
[02:00.62]I got 'em reaching out for recipes
[02:03.01]I got some other n***as scared of me
[02:05.64]Yeah
[02:06.64]They used to toot they nose at me
[02:07.93]At me
[02:08.29]But I ain't let it get the best of me
[02:10.41]Same n***as toot they nose at me can't even stand next to me
[02:12.99]Yeah yeah
[02:13.51]You know good d**e gon' sell itself I just served you a circle
[02:16.01]Circle
[02:16.23]Youngin' turned nothing into something the life of the turtle
[02:18.79]How I'm feeling
[02:20.95]I'm feeling
[02:22.38]It doesn't matter
[02:24.05]Don't matter
[02:24.90]'Cause you know I'm okay
[02:28.77]Okay yeah yeah
[02:30.50]Instead I ask myself "Why do you worry"
[02:35.91]Worry
[02:36.20]You know you know I'm the same
[02:40.30]Ooh ooh-ooh ah
[02:42.16]Still I know you don't love me baby
[02:46.05]I know you don't love me baby
[02:47.84]They try to take you away from me
[02:52.28]Away from me
[02:53.66]Only over my dead body
data.trans:
[ti:OMDB]
[ar:Rod Wave]
[al:SoulFly (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:10.11]//
[00:20.22]Yung Tago制作
[00:23.28]我的感受并不重要
[00:29.16]因为你知道我还好
[00:33.28]//
[00:34.66]相反 我问自己 你为什么忧心忡忡
[00:39.94]忧心忡忡
[00:40.69]你知道 你知道我还是老样子
[00:45.38]你知道我还是老样子
[00:46.52]我依然知道你并不爱我 宝贝
[00:51.64]//
[00:51.91]他们试图从我身边夺走你
[00:57.95]必须先踏过我的尸体
[01:09.79]清醒过来 凝视着镜子里的自己 让我大吃一惊
[01:12.09]让我大吃一惊
[01:12.72]从来自贫民窟的哥们当中脱颖而出 上帝选择了我
[01:15.00]选择了我
[01:15.68]我把整座城市的重担扛在肩上 这座城市告诉我
[01:18.30]//
[01:18.53]无论我面临多么巨大的压力 无法让我妥协退让
[01:20.80]让我屈服
[01:21.46]成名会带来很多东西 这一切能够让你失去理智
[01:23.91]疯狂
[01:24.51]去看看我兄弟沉迷的那些** 他沉浸在幻觉里
[01:26.82]沉浸在幻觉里
[01:27.04]你怎么能够告诉奶奶 我把灵魂出卖给了撒旦
[01:29.93]对我家乡那些取得成功的哥们来说 这是多么罕见
[01:32.85]有谁来抓住他 掐他一下 拜托 这不是梦
[01:35.65]这不是梦
[01:36.28]远离互联网 如王者一样 这种生活并非表面看上去那样
[01:38.17]并非表面看上去那样
[01:38.90]对那些肆意嘲笑我的博客和表情包不屑一顾
[01:41.48]//
[01:41.65]我刚刚醒来 在飞去海外的路上进账六百多万
[01:44.15]//
[01:44.68]我还记得五百美元一场的演出 我为了这些钱踏上旅途
[01:47.05]为了这些钱踏上旅途
[01:47.70]即使在居家隔离期间 我仍有赚钱的好时机
[01:49.66]居家隔离
[01:50.33]我们以前一败涂地 可现在我们高高在上
[01:52.78]高高在上
[01:53.38]舞台坍塌 这是唯一一次你看见我跌倒在地的机会
[01:55.53]在我前面的哥们
[01:56.91]//
[01:57.70]在两年前领先于我
[01:59.99]//
[02:00.62]我让他们找到成功的出路
[02:03.01]我让其他哥们对我闻风丧胆
[02:05.64]//
[02:06.64]他们以前总是对我嗤之以鼻
[02:07.93]对我嗤之以鼻
[02:08.29]但是我不会让他们打败我
[02:10.41]还是那群对我嗤之以鼻的家伙 甚至无法与我并肩而立
[02:12.99]//
[02:13.51]你知道酒香不怕巷子深 我刚刚给你点颜色看看
[02:16.01]小试牛刀
[02:16.23]年轻人白手起家 功成名就 漫长的一生
[02:18.79]我的感受
[02:20.95]我的感受
[02:22.38]一点也不重要
[02:24.05]并不重要
[02:24.90]因为你知道我还好
[02:28.77]安然无恙
[02:30.50]相反 我问自己 你为什么忧心忡忡
[02:35.91]忧心忡忡
[02:36.20]你知道 你知道我还是老样子
[02:40.30]//
[02:42.16]我依然知道你并不爱我 宝贝
[02:46.05]我知道你并不爱我 宝贝
[02:47.84]他们试图从我身边夺走你
[02:52.28]从我身边夺走
[02:53.66]必须先踏过我的尸体
